description_zh: 什么值得买(SMZDM) 是一家电商导购平台，旨在帮助用户找到高性价比的商品和优惠信息。
description_en: What to Buy (SMZDM) is an e-commerce referral platform aiming to help users find high-cost-performance products and discount information.
rating_zh: 什么值得买是在帮助用户进行消费决策。所以可在软件区，发布软件教程、应用推荐，以到达软性推广产品的目的
rating_en: Smzdm (What to Buy) helps users make consumption decisions. Therefore, you can publish software tutorials and app recommendations in the software section to achieve the goal of soft promotion of products.
